tree.title: DriveCon
tree.notes:
Main DBs:
DB1710 - parameters for different thickness,
DB1711 - package parameters
!!!! DB1711.DBW26 - drive interface !!!!

children.title: FC1705 DRV_WDR_Input
children.description: Drives inputs, hyd inputs, HSP PIW
children.notes:
Reading all pressure switches for roll close,
reading analog for Hot Strand Pressure,
reading digitals for drives:
Power supply drive & brake & fan + brake & fan feedback

Here is also the pressure UP OK signal I66.1 goes to DB1830.DBX140.0
